## Overview

China is the world's largest emitter of greenhouse gases. It has set a target to achieve carbon peak by 2030 and carbon neutrality by 2060. This initiative aims to facilitate the transition to a low-carbon economy in China to achieve the national carbon peak and carbon neutrality targets.
